name: Dice Control
description:
The Wager Wizard has transformed you into a die and trapped you in the Gambling Dimension! Luckily, you are the king of dice control, and by rolling just right you'll be able to cross pitfalls, tackle foes and make your escape.

Control the die with WASD. Hold SPACE and then press in any direction to dash. You'll travel the same amount of spaces as the number of pips shown on the die. Try to beat all 12 levels!

Music credits:

  • "De Jongens Met de Zwarte Schoenen" by RoccoW & xyce
  • "Chipho instrumental" by RoccoW
  • "Messeah" by RoccoW
